channel.title: [PI] Funpk Loosing items
channel.description: Hello, I was wondering if anyone could help me fix this problem, My players are loosing items in funpk and skulling.. i have no idea how to fix this.. Can anyone help me? Thank you.

item.title: [PI] Funpk Loosing items
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Create a method for FunPK.

Check out the inMulti method.

Add something like this:

	if(playerIsLocatedInFunPK()) {
		return true;
		}
	public boolean playerIsLocatedInFunPK() {
		return absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <= YYYY;
	}

Then, add in exceptions everywhere, so they won’t lose their items if they’re in those coordinates.

&& !playerIsLocatedInFunPK()

P.S. I know my conventions are off, I prefer PK instead of Pk.

Read full topic
